title: Mom's Heartbreaking Pic of Son Fighting Cancer | The KiddChris Show | X101.5
text:
Mom's Heartbreaking Pic of Son Fighting Cancer posted by KiddChris - Posted by Love What Matters on Monday, February 20, 2017 The KiddChris Show - Weekdays 5am-10am 
I have done radio in: New York, Kansas, California, Texas, Oregon, Philly, Georgia, and Ohio. I have done Hip Hop, Rock, and Talk. I have also been syndicated and I have been fired! I also worked on "The Howard Stern Show" for a bit. I also like girls, but money can change my mind. Social
